newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Fruitfed says result deteriorated.
newsitem.headline: Fruitfed says result deteriorated.

text.p: Fruitfed Ltd said on Wednesday that its result had deteriorated since September and it anticipated the final dividend would be lower than last year's.

"Compared with last year the company's trading results for the period since September 1996 have deteriorated since the half-year announcement due to adverse climatic conditions and unsatisfactory returns to growers," it said.
"Cashflow remains satisfactory and the company is in a sound financial position," it added.
